hibernate-mapping.query: select C.id as id, C.dateCreation as dateCreation, C.postId as postId, C.text as text, COALESCE((select sum(V.value) from Vote V where V.commentId = C.id group by V.commentId), 0) as voteCount, C.user as user from Comment C where C.postId = :postId order by C.dateCreation desc
